targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snapmirror")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({unique_name: r.cluster + "_" + r.relationship_id}) )
  |> unique(column: "unique_name")
  |> count(column: "unique_name")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snapmirror" and r._field == "healthy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({unique_name: r.cluster + "_" + r.relationship_id}) )
  |> unique(column: "unique_name")
  |> count(column: "unique_name")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snapmirror" and r._field == "group_type")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == "svm")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({unique_name: r.cluster + "_" + r.relationship_id}) )
  |> unique(column: "unique_name")
  |> count(column: "unique_name")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snapmirror" and r._field == "group_type")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == "none")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({unique_name: r.cluster + "_" + r.relationship_id}) )
  |> unique(column: "unique_name")
  |> count(column: "unique_name")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snapmirror" and r._field == "group_type")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == "flexgroup")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({unique_name: r.cluster + "_" + r.relationship_id}) )
  |> unique(column: "unique_name")
  |> count(column: "unique_name")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snapmirror")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["group_type", "relationship_status", "schedule", "unhealthy_reason", "healthy"]))
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snapmirror" and r["_field"] == "relationship_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["destination_node"], set: ${DestinationNode:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.destination_node + " - " + r._value}) )
  |> group(columns: ["display_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: count, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snapmirror" and r["_field"] == "total_transfer_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["destination_node"], set: ${DestinationNode:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["destination_node"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snapmirror" and r["_field"] == "lag_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["destination_node"], set: ${DestinationNode:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["destination_node"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snapmirror")
  |> keep(columns: ["datacenter"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "datacenter")
list.name: Datacenter
